medical_history.chief_complaint: Visual loss secondary to thyroid eye disease (TED)
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Progressive visual loss over 1 year. Case 1: Complete right visual loss for 3 months. Case 2: Complete visual loss of 5 days duration before surgery. Case 3: Complete visual loss in the right eye for 3 months and progressive visual loss in the left eye.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Thyroid eye disease; Case 2 also has diabetes and heavy tobacco use.
